mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 3407) for an order placed by the Cedarwood Publishing Company for 500 one color 7 x 7" handbills that read Stateside, 300 one color 9 x 3 5/8" cards for Red Sovine, and 300 one color 8 x 3 5/8" cards for Bob Luman. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
